name: Brightwood Adventures
description:
"Explore this forest paradise island and become a hero. Challenge yourself and build your own town, city or farm by clearing out a jungle. Create beautiful spaces with your own houses, buildings, castles and collectibles. Have fun in this exciting farm simulation game.

Things to do in this fun filled secret, uncharted paradise island:
● Use your sword or axe to slash through the jungle and overcome obstacle
● Construct beautiful houses and buildings from rayman adventures to live in
● Make your own farm story - grow and harvest crops, fruits and vegetables to survive
● Make your own township on this sland complete with garden,flowers,trees,houses
● Build your own castle of illusion in a city
● Unlock powerful characters like a ship pirate, collectibles, special gifts and many more items as you level up
● Challenge yourself to Team Challenges
● Get extra resources during time bound sales events or by clearing debris or hay day
● Uncover secret by cracking open a case of easter eggs, wood crates
● Adventure to a country escape, and construct or build a great township
● Join the action and earn rewards like sword, gold, spirit and silver coins to progress in the game
● Minecraft the land for hidden object treasures like a temple run
● Play mini games, quests and team challenges
● Compete with friends like raman on social team challenges and win big rewards
● Create your country escape and explore this paradise island from a long time ago i.e. ice age
● Build a thriving township or city from the land for your neighbors
● Become a hero and help Wally, Rowan, and other heroes and characters settle into their city or township from another time

Join the quest in the exploration of King Lionheart's secret and adventurous past ! Conquer and breathe life into the lost woodlands.

Come all ye heroes! The uncharted paradise island awaits!

Join Wally and Rowan in this country escape to a paradise island to discover and explore King Lionheart's township, lost with the advent of the ice age time. These characters seek your help to restore it from a tiny island to a great city!

It doesn't matter if your are a family guy or girl or a batman or a zombie or if you like or dislike building things. You will have fun in this interactive role playing farm simulation game.

Enjoy the original of all role play,multiplayer Rockyou games (Shipwrecked, Westbound, Goldrush, Volcano Island, Skull Island & New World). Supported on most smartphones and tablets.

If you like farmville country escape or farm story or hay day you will like this game.

Note: You must be at least 13 years of age to play or download this game. For more information, please refer to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
